title: THREE CAME HOME
description:
Three Came Home (1950) 

A  106 min   -  War | Drama  -  20 February 1950 (USA
The true story of Agnes Newton Keith's imprisonment in several Japanese prisoner-of-war camps from 1941 to the end of WWII. Separated from her husband and with a young son to care for she.

Claudette Colbert
 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0043041/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0043041/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1</a>

                                     
                                   THREE CAME HOME
                   
                      'A Quiet courage - 'A Voice for All TO HEAR'

An immensely compelling  movie starring Claudette colbert  as  American Author
Agnes Newton Keith on whose autobiography the film is based.It depicts how the 
Author and her husband a British administrator were trapped in Borneo when the 
Japanese forces invaded.The Keith's were taken to separate camps.
The commander Colonel Suga (  Sessue Hayakawa) takes a particular interest in
the authoress but his humanitarian tendencies cannot help the stricken Agnes as she
subjected to torture and humiliation at the hands of the Guards.

A true and moving portrayal of a womans fight against seemingly insurmountable odds,
and how her spirit and will helped her to survive the injustice of war.


                             
                                   BLACK AND WHITE


                           Director:Jean Negule
                           
                     Writers:
 Nunnally Johnson (screenplay), Agnes Newton Keith (book) 

Stars:
 Claudette Colbert, Patric Knowles, Florence Desmond |
